summary: Stas, the cosmonaut, gets lost in space. When he comes back he finds Earth completely empty of human life. Yulia and Andrei wait for him on the other side of a collapsing world. How far would you go for love?
cast: Katrine De Candole|Leon Ockenden|Max Wrottesley|David Barrass|Hans-Eckart Eckhardt|Lee Cheney|Aleksander Sasha Kelberg|Gints Andzans|Ieva Puke|Arturs Lindemanis|Tommaso De Santis|Greg Blackford|Roberts Lismanis|Egils Melbardis|Daiga Kazocina|Ivars Auzins|Guy Williams|Nikolas Kadegis|Ted Viripajev|Andrejs Muzikants|Nicole Kasenko|Ksenija Mlikova|David Liell|Benjamin Maurice Roth|Vladimirs Mihailovs|Max Kadegis|Hermans Egleskalns|Gints Treijs|Oleg Shaposhnikov|Andis A. Blukis|Leonarda Kestere-Klavina|Artjoms Krizanovskis|Daniella Trofimova|Edgars Mazuras|Felix Vilijun|Steve Galache
title: El cosmonauta
